name: House of 1000 Souls
description:
Collect souls as a Ghostly debt collector in this spooky roguelike.

Made as part of a self-induced weekly jam project based around creating a game with procedurally generated enemies. All ghosts in the game are created by assembling together different intentionally vague sprites to create strange visual combinations. All ghost behaviors are randomized too, with their respective speeds, projectile patterns, health and sizes being RNG-based.
